text: Uye kana varanda vangu vakakubvunza (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)) maererano neni, (vapindure uchiti), Zvirokwazvo ndiri pedyo (kwavari neruzivo rwangu). Ndinopindura chikumbiro chouyo anondidana kana achinge andidana (pasina mumiririri). Nokudaro ngavave vanonditeerera, nokutenda mandiri, kuti vave vanotungamirirwa munzira kwayo
